Perceptor::

"So are we now in the Ecological Channel?" sai dPerceptor with a slight 
sarcasm

-----Original Message----- 
From: Sandy
Sent: Wednesday, July 13, 2011 9:24 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)

Tucson could hear the Predacon in the room and sense his signature.  At this 
time he felt there was no time to actually deal with enemy forces and having 
one directly in the same room was not good, but at the same time, this 
predacon wasn't making any moves to attack anyone, as he could rightfully 
sense.  Yet, his pressense does make him uneasy.

" Leo Prime, have the Ark checked for loopholes in our security system, if 
this predacon was able to breach our system there may be a chance  that 
others could slip easilly by our security system. We can't afford to have 
our operations compromised, not now. And where the pit is Rodimus?"

Straight Shot makes it back in the room, as Tucson asks the question.

" He's trying to find Wheelie."

Tucson nodds.

" Of course, but does it have to take that long?  Anyway, Leo Prime, given 
the situation at hand, which you have described as rightfully iminent, we 
will have to do everything in our power to be sure that this planet is kept 
undesturbed, and left as Nature intended it to evolve.  But in order to do 
that, we need an energy supply to boost the Ark's systems, and right now we 
don't have that, but, we will if we take Quickstride's proposal into 
consideration.  Energy is everything but at the same time, we do not want to 
steal from this planet, when we can actually develop ways to produce our own 
by working with it rather than against it.  Perceptor brought up a very 
valid point as well.  Hydras did have access to power, but unlike 
Quickstride's method of harnessing it, he just left it to go out of control, 
and look where that got him.  We have the upper hand, a means to work with a 
natural resource that is less harmful to some degree, and will not risk any 
danger to our lives and those that reside on this planet.  Now, as soon as 
Rodimus gets here, I'd like Quickstride to explain and show all of us, the 
project he's working on, to provide the Ark with an energy source."

He turns to Quickstride once more.

" After all, energy is everything, and we have to do everything in our power 
to produce and concerve it."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> As everyone walked in, talking amongst themselves, rather than being
> greeted by the site of an impatient LEO PRIME they see LEO talking
> with a green mech who is giving off a definite Predacon signature, a
> mech called CELERON.
>
> So far LEO PRIME still had no actual weapons out but he was looking at
> the Predacon and asking a question, "Tell me, why did you, a Predacon,
> bring this to our attention? I would think that this would work in
> your favor, perhaps use the confusion to accomplish whatever you have
> in mind." His face was registering more curiousity than distrust at
> this point, although his manner was a bit reserved.
>
> At the same time as LEO talked the fuzors TORCA, NOCTORO were watching
> the Predacon from their sides. They were standing at the ready but had
> as yet made no hostile move.
>
> (TAG)
>
> Preston
